content:
# Organizational Chart of NII

## Director

- **Deputy Director / Staff Scientist - VIII**

  - **Staff Scientist - II to VII**

    - **-**
      - **Senior Technical Officer**
        - Technical Officer - II
        - Technical Officer - I
        - Technician - I
        - Technician - II
        - Skilled Work Assistant

  - **Senior Manager**

    - **Manager (Admin / Estate)**

      - **Administrative Officer (Admin)**

        - Section Officer
        - Management Assistant
        - Junior Assistant - I
        - Driver
        - Skilled Work Assistant

      - **Finance & Account Officer**

        - Account Officer
        - Management Assistant
        - Junior Assistant - I
        - Junior Assistant - II
        - Skilled Work Assistant

      - **Store Purchase Officer**

        - Section Officer
        - Management Assistant
        - Junior Assistant - I
        - Junior Assistant - II
        - Skilled Work Assistant

      - **Administrative Officer (Academic)**

        - Section Officer
        - Junior Assistant - 1
        - Junior Assistant - 2
        - Skilled Work Assistant

      - **Documentation Officer**

        - Senior Technical Officer
        - Technical Officer - II
        - Technical Officer - I
        - Technician - II
        - Skilled Work Assistant

      - **Executive Engineer**

        - Senior Technical Officer
        - Assistant Engineer
        - Technical Officer - I
        - Technician - I
        - Technician - II
        - Tradesman

      - **Public Relations Officer (PRO)**
